com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.playlist

Class HlsMasterPlaylist

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.playlist.HlsPlaylist
      • com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.playlist.HlsMasterPlaylist

  • public final class HlsMasterPlaylist
extends HlsPlaylist
    Represents an HLS master playlist.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl
      Represents a url in an HLS master playlist.

    • Field Summary

      The format of the audio muxed in the variants.

      The format of the closed captions declared by the playlist.
      List<HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl> subtitles
      The list of subtitles declared by the playlist.
      List<HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl> variants

    • Field Detail

      • variants

        public final List<HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl> variants
        The list of variants declared by the playlist.

      • audios

        public final List<HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl> audios
        The list of demuxed audios declared by the playlist.

      • subtitles

        public final List<HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl> subtitles
        The list of subtitles declared by the playlist.

      • muxedAudioFormat

        public final Format muxedAudioFormat
        The format of the audio muxed in the variants. May be null if the playlist does not declare any muxed audio.

      • muxedCaptionFormats

        public final List<Format> muxedCaptionFormats
        The format of the closed captions declared by the playlist. May be empty if the playlist explicitly declares no captions are available, or null if the playlist does not declare any captions information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HlsMasterPlaylist

        public HlsMasterPlaylist(String baseUri,
                         List<HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl> variants,
                         List<HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl> audios,
                         List<HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl> subtitles,
                         Format muxedAudioFormat,
                         List<Format> muxedCaptionFormats)
        Parameters:
        baseUri - The base uri. Used to resolve relative paths.
        variants - See variants.
        audios - See audios.
        subtitles - See subtitles.
        muxedAudioFormat - See muxedAudioFormat.
        muxedCaptionFormats - See muxedCaptionFormats.

    • Method Detail

      • createSingleVariantMasterPlaylist

        public static HlsMasterPlaylist createSingleVariantMasterPlaylist(String variantUrl)
        Creates a playlist with a single variant.
        Parameters:
        variantUrl - The url of the single variant.
        Returns:
        A master playlist with a single variant for the provided url.
